_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Curseforge Generic
author: parker@parkervcp.com
description: A generic egg for a forge modpack

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Forge Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
if [ ! -d /mnt/server ]; then
    mkdir -p /mnt/server
fi

function install_required {
    apt update
    apt install -y curl jq unzip dos2unix
}

function get_download {
    # get json data to work with
    echo -e "Curling the json for the modpack"
    echo -e "running: curl -sSL https://addons-ecs.forgesvc.net/api/v2/addon/${MODPACK_ID}"
    JSON_DATA=$(curl -sSL https://addons-ecs.forgesvc.net/api/v2/addon/${MODPACK_ID})

    # if no modpack version is set or is set to latest
    if [ -z ${MODPACK_VERSION} ] || [ "${MODPACK_VERSION}" = "latest" ]; then
        echo -e "Getting latest download url"
        # parse data to get the download url
        FILE_ID=$(echo -e ${JSON_DATA} | jq -r .defaultFileId)
        echo -e "File ID is: ${FILE_ID}"
        if [ "$(echo -e ${JSON_DATA} | jq -r --arg FILE_ID "$FILE_ID" ".latestFiles[] | select(.id==$FILE_ID) | .isServerPack")" == "false" ] && [ "$(echo -e ${JSON_DATA} | jq -r --arg FILE_ID "$FILE_ID" ".latestFiles[] | select(.id==$FILE_ID) | .serverPackFileId")" != "null" ]; then
            FILE_ID=$(echo -e ${JSON_DATA} | jq -r --arg FILE_ID "$FILE_ID" ".latestFiles[] | select(.id==$FILE_ID) | .serverPackFileId")
            DOWNLOAD_URL=$(curl -sSL https://addons-ecs.forgesvc.net/api/v2/addon/${MODPACK_ID}/file/${FILE_ID}/download-url)
        else
            DOWNLOAD_URL=$(curl -sSL https://addons-ecs.forgesvc.net/api/v2/addon/${MODPACK_ID}/file/${FILE_ID}/download-url)
        fi
        echo -e "Download url set to ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
    else
        echo -e "Looking for download url for version ${MODPACK_VERSION}"
        # parse files for version match
        FILES_JSON_DATA=$(curl -sSL https://addons-ecs.forgesvc.net/api/v2/addon/${MODPACK_ID}/files)
        # get element number to get the exact location in the json
        FILES_JSON_ELEMENT=$(echo -e ${FILES_JSON_DATA} | jq --arg VERSION "${MODPACK_VERSION}" '.[] | select(.displayName) | .displayName | contains($VERSION)' | grep -n true | cut -f1 -d: | tail -1)
        # if there wasn't a match default to latest
        if [ ! -z ${FILES_JSON_ELEMENT} ]; then
            echo -e "No matching version found"
            echo -e "defaulting to latest"
            DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo -e ${FILES_JSON_DATA} | jq --arg ELEMENT "${FILES_JSON_ELEMENT}" '.[$ELEMENT|tonumber-1] | .downloadUrl')
        else
            echo -e "Version match found"
            DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo -e ${JSON_DATA} | jq -r .latestFiles[0].downloadUrl)
            echo -e "Download url set to ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
        fi
    fi

    ## download modpack files
    cd /mnt/server
    echo "Executing curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL} -o server.zip"
    curl -L "${DOWNLOAD_URL}" -o server.zip
    unzip -o server.zip
    rm -rf server.zip
}

function forge_install {
    echo -e "\nInstalling forge server using the installer jar file.\n"
    if [ -f /mnt/server/*installer.jar ]; then
        java -jar *installer.jar --installServer
    else
        echo "No forge installer found moving on."
    fi
    mv FTBServer.jar server.jar
}

function forge_cleanup {
    echo -e "\nDeleting installer jar file and cleaning up.\n"
    rm -rf *installer.jar
    if [ ! -f /mnt/server/*universal.jar ]; then
        mv -v /mnt/server/*/* /mnt/server/
        if [ ! -f /mnt/server/*universal.jar ]; then
            mv forge*.jar server.jar
        else
            mv *universal.jar server.jar  
        fi
    else
        mv *universal.jar server.jar
    fi
}

function json_download_prework {
   mkdir -p /mnt/server/mods
   cd /mnt/server/mods
}

function json_download_mods {
    MANIFEST=/mnt/server/manifest.json
    for mod in $(jq -c '.files[]' ${MANIFEST} ); do
        projID=$(echo $mod | jq -r ".projectID")
        fileID=$(echo $mod | jq -r ".fileID")
        URL=$(curl -sSL https://addons-ecs.forgesvc.net/api/v2/addon/${projID}/file/${fileID}/download-url)
        # this is saving everything as /mnt/server/mods/download
        echo "Mod direct url: ${URL}"
        curl -JLO "${URL}"
    done
}

function json_download_forge {
    cd /mnt/server
    FORGE=$(jq -r '.minecraft.modLoaders[0].id' /mnt/server/manifest.json | cut -d '-' -f2)
    MCVER=$(jq -r '.minecraft.version' /mnt/server/manifest.json)
	if [ ${MCVER} == "1.7.10" ] || [ ${MCVER} == "1.8.9" ]; then
		FORGE="${FORGE}-${MCVER}"
	fi
    FORGE_VERSION="${MCVER}-${FORGE}"
    
    echo -e "\nDownloading Forge Version $FORGE_VERSION\n"
    echo -e "running curl -sS https://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/$FORGE_VERSION/forge-$FORGE_VERSION-installer.jar -o installer.jar \n"
    curl -sS https://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/$FORGE_VERSION/forge-$FORGE_VERSION-installer.jar -o installer.jar
    echo -e "running curl -sS https://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/$FORGE_VERSION/forge-$FORGE_VERSION-universal.jar -O \n"
    curl -sS https://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/$FORGE_VERSION/forge-$FORGE_VERSION-universal.jar -O
    java -jar installer.jar --installServer
    mv *universal.jar server.jar
    rm installer.jar
}

function json_download_overrides {
    if [ -d /mnt/server/overrides ]; then
        mv /mnt/server/overrides/mods/* /mnt/server/mods/
        rmdir /mnt/server/overrides/mods
        mv /mnt/server/overrides/* /mnt/server
        rmdir /mnt/server/overrides
    fi
}

function cfg_download_forge {
    dos2unix settings.cfg # In case the pack was distributed with Windows-style line endings in the cfg file
    MCVER=`grep 'MCVER' settings.cfg | sed 's/;//g' | cut -d '=' -f 2-`
    FORGE=`grep 'FORGEVER' settings.cfg | sed 's/;//g' | cut -d '=' -f 2-`

	if [ ${MCVER} == "1.7.10" ] || [ ${MCVER} == "1.8.9" ]; then
		FORGE="${FORGE}-${MCVER}"
	fi
    
    FORGE_VERSION="${MCVER}-${FORGE}"
    echo -e ${FORGE_VERSION}
    
    echo -e "\nDownloading Forge Version $FORGE_VERSION\n"
    echo -e "running curl -sS https://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/$FORGE_VERSION/forge-$FORGE_VERSION-installer.jar -o installer.jar \n"
    curl -sS https://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/$FORGE_VERSION/forge-$FORGE_VERSION-installer.jar -o installer.jar
    echo -e "running curl -sS https://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/$FORGE_VERSION/forge-$FORGE_VERSION-universal.jar -O \n"
    curl -sS https://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/$FORGE_VERSION/forge-$FORGE_VERSION-universal.jar -O
    java -jar installer.jar --installServer
    mv *universal.jar server.jar
    rm installer.jar
}

function ftb_install {
    chmod +x /mnt/server/settings.sh 
    . /mnt/server/settings.sh 
    curl https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraft.Download/versions/${MCVER}/minecraft_server.${MCVER}.jar -o ${JARFILE} 
    curl https://libraries.minecraft.net/${LAUNCHWRAPPER} -o /mnt/server/libraries/${LAUNCHWRAPPER}
}

install_required
get_download

if [ -f /mnt/server/manifest.json ]; then
    json_download_prework
    json_download_mods
    json_download_overrides
    json_download_forge
elif [ -f /mnt/server/settings.cfg ]; then
    cfg_download_forge
elif [ -f /mnt/server/version.json ]; then
    if [ "$(cat /mnt/server/version.json | jq -r '.packID | contains("FTB")')" == "true" ]; then
        ftb_install
    fi
else
    forge_install
    forge_cleanup
fi

variables.name: modpack project ID
variables.description:
The modpack project ID from the curseforge site on the pack page.

(Ex. https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/sevtech-ages ID is 268208)

variables.name: Modpack Version
variables.description: Version of the modpack to use.
